TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DropShadowBitmapEffect extends System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect
Public NotInheritable Class DropShadowBitmapEffect Inherits BitmapEffect
.class public auto ansi sealed DropShadowBitmapEffect extends System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect

summary.span: 在视觉对象后的轻微偏移量处应用阴影。

span.span: Applies a shadow behind a visual object at a slight offset.

summary.span: 偏移量是通过模仿来自虚构光源的投射阴影确定的。

span.span: The offset is determined by mimicking a casting shadow from an imaginary light source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 位图效果是呈现的软件。bitmap effects are software rendered. 应用效果的任何对象也都将以软件形式呈现。Any object that applies an effect will also be rendered in software. 位图效果不应应用于大视觉对象或动画，因为这可能会降低性能。Bitmap effects should not be applied to large visuals or animations because this can degrade performance.

summary.span: 创建此 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values.

summary.span: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

returns.span: 当前对象的可修改复本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使源的 属性为 ，所克隆的对象的 属性也将为 。

span.span: The cloned object's property will be even if the source's property was .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成冻结 对象 (或任何对象) 的可修改副本 。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法会隐藏继承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

span.span: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.

returns.span: 当前对象的可修改复本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使源的 属性为 ，所克隆的对象的 属性也将为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成冻结 对象 (或任何对象) 的可修改副本 。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法会隐藏继承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

member this.Color : System.Windows.Media.Color with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置阴影的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color of the shadow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性将忽略结构的 alpha 值。The alpha value of the structure is ignored by this property. 若要设置颜色的透明度 (alpha) ，请使用 属性。To set the amount of transparency (alpha) of the color, use the property. 下图演示了此属性的效果。The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property. ![屏幕快照：比较阴影颜色属性值](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowcolor.png "屏幕快照：比较阴影颜色属性值")![Screenshot: Compare shadow color property values](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowcolor.png "Screenshot: Compare shadow color property values") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Direction { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.Direction : double with get, set

span.span: Gets or sets the angle at which the shadow is cast.
The angle at which the shadow is cast.
The valid range of values is from 0 through 360.

value.span: 值 0 将方向置于对象紧右侧。

span.span: The value 0 puts the direction immediately to the right of the object.

value.span: 后续值将绕对象沿逆时针方向移动方向。

span.span: Subsequent values move the direction around the object in a counter-clockwise direction.

value.span: 例如，如果值为 90，则表示阴影直接投射到对象的上方；如果值为 180，则阴影直接投射到对象的左侧，依此类推。

span.span: For example, a value of 90 indicates the shadow is cast directly upward from the object; a value of 180 is cast directly to the left of the object, and so on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图显示了在哪个方向上，为此属性的给定值强制转换了阴影。The following diagram shows in which direction the shadow is cast for a given value of this property. ![示意图：DropShadow 方向](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowdirection2.png "示意图：DropShadow 方向")![Diagram: DropShadow direction](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowdirection2.png "Diagram: DropShadow direction") 下图演示了此属性的效果。The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property. ![屏幕快照：比较阴影方向](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowdirection.png "屏幕快照：比较阴影方向")![Screenshot: Compare shadow direction](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowdirection.png "Screenshot: Compare shadow direction") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

Public Shared ReadOnly DirectionProperty As DependencyProperty
public: property double Noise { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.Noise : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置阴影的粒度或“噪音级别”。

span.span: Gets or sets the graininess, or "noise level," of the shadow.
The noise level of the shadow.
The valid range of values is from 0 through 1.

value.span: 值为 0 表示没有噪点，值为 1 表示最大噪点。

span.span: A value of 0 indicates no noise and 1 indicates maximum noise.

value.span: 值 0.5 表示 50% 噪音，值 0.75 表示 75% 噪音，依此类推。

span.span: A value of 0.5 indicates 50 percent noise, a value of 0.75 indicates 75 percent noise, and so on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图演示了此属性的效果。The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property. ![屏幕快照：比较 Noise 属性值](~/add/media/effects-dropshadownoise.png "屏幕快照：比较 Noise 属性值")![Screenshot: Compare Noise property values](~/add/media/effects-dropshadownoise.png "Screenshot: Compare Noise property values") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty NoiseProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly NoiseProperty As DependencyProperty
public: property double Opacity { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.Opacity : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置阴影的不透明度。

span.span: Gets or sets the degree of opacity of the shadow.
The valid range of values is from 0 through 1.

value.span: 如果值为 0，则表示阴影完全透明；如果值为 1，则表示阴影完全不透明。

span.span: A value of 0 indicates that the shadow is completely transparent, and a value of 1 indicates that the shadow is completely opaque.

value.span: 如果值为 0.5，则表示阴影不透明度为 50%；如果值为 0.725，则表示阴影不透明度为 72.5%，依此类推。

span.span: A value of 0.5 indicates the shadow is 50 percent opaque, a value of 0.725 indicates the shadow is 72.5 percent opaque, and so on.

value.span: 小于 0 的值将被视为 0，而大于 1 的值将被视为 1。

span.span: Values less than 0 are treated as 0, while values greater than 1 are treated as 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性必须用于设置的不透明度， 因为属性的 alpha 级别组件 被忽略。This property must be used to set the opacity of the because the alpha level component of the property is ignored. 下图演示了此属性的效果。The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property. ![具有标注的屏幕快照：DropShadowBitmapEffect](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowopacity.png "具有标注的屏幕快照：DropShadowBitmapEffect")![Screenshot with callouts: DropShadowBitmapEffect](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowopacity.png "Screenshot with callouts: DropShadowBitmapEffect") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

Public Shared ReadOnly OpacityProperty As DependencyProperty
public: property double ShadowDepth { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.ShadowDepth : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置对象与其投影间的距离。

span.span: Gets or sets the distance between the object and the shadow that it casts.

value.span: 投影对象的平面与阴影平面之间的距离，以[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]为度量单位。

span.span: The distance between the plane of the object casting the shadow and the shadow plane measured in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
The valid range of values is from 0 through 300.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图演示了此属性的效果。The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property. ![屏幕快照：比较 ShadowDepth 属性值](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowshadowdepth.png "屏幕快照：比较 ShadowDepth 属性值")![Screenshot: Compare ShadowDepth property values](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowshadowdepth.png "Screenshot: Compare ShadowDepth property values") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

Public Shared ReadOnly ShadowDepthProperty As DependencyProperty
public: property double Softness { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.Softness : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置阴影的柔和度。

span.span: Gets or sets the softness of the shadow.
The valid range of values is from 0 through 1.

value.span: 值 0.0 表示无柔和度（非常清晰的阴影），1.0 表示最大柔和度（非常模糊的阴影）。

span.span: A value of 0.0 indicates no softness (a sharply defined shadow) and 1.0 indicates maximum softness (a very diffused shadow).

value.span: 值 0.5 表示 50% 的柔和度，值 0.75 表示 75% 的柔和度，依此类推。

span.span: A value of 0.5 indicates 50 percent softness, a value of 0.75 indicates 75 percent softness, and so on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图演示了此属性的效果。The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property. ![屏幕快照：比较 Softness 属性值](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowsoftness.png "屏幕快照：比较 Softness 属性值")![Screenshot: Compare Softness property values](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowsoftness.png "Screenshot: Compare Softness property values") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
